english.segment1: Waiting for you. Nothing in this world can bring me. Peace and madness. They've become the very best of friends
english.segment2: Walking with you. Blindly follow out upon the. Water runs down. You've become the very best of friends
english.segment3: I'll live for you and try to be the king of fools. I'll long for you and walk before the king of all
english.segment4: Joy has found me. Living life without you would be. Hell or heaven. Soon we'll find the greatest king of fools
english.segment5: I'll live for you and try to be the king of fools. I'll long just to walk before the king of fools.
